actions.text: On agreeing to the Klug amendment (A004) as amended Agreed to by voice vote.

description: Amendment originally sought to reduce by $18.4 million the funds appropriated for OPIC direct and guaranteed loans. \   As amended by the Callahan substitute amendment (A005), the above was replaced with language that reduces by $10 million the funds appropriated for OPIC direct and guaranteed loans.
purpose: An amendment, printed as amendment No. 25 in the Congressional Record of June 20, 1995, to cut $18.4 million from the funds appropriated in the bill for OPIC direct and guaranteed loans.
